data.what_is: SalesSeek CRM is an all-in-one business platform designed to help large teams centralize and manage their customer data. Oversee your opportunities in the visual sales funnel and track individual activity, from billing and payments to marketing and support. Managers get a complete overview of team performance and KPIs, while team members have the ability to work collaboratively across all accounts accessing the customer data they need to win more business. Visit www.salesseek.com for more information or to arrange a free demo or trial.
data.product_description: SalesSeek design-led platform provides Contact & Deal Management, Email Marketing & Automation, Forecasting, Task Management, Web Analytics, and Social Monitoring in a fresh and visual web application.Affordable price, data visualisation, unlimited contacts and email campaigns. Marketing and Sales integration out of the box.
data.positioning_against_competitor: Product DescriptionSalesSeek design-led platform provides Contact & Deal Management, Email Marketing & Automation, Forecasting, Task Management, Web Analytics, and Social Monitoring in a fresh and visual web application.Affordable price, data visualisation, unlimited contacts and email campaigns. Marketing and Sales integration out of the box.Seller DetailsSellerSalesSeek LimitedYear Founded2012HQ LocationLondon, UKTwitter@SalesSeek921 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com13 employees on LinkedIn(r)TSOverview Provided by:Team SalesSeek

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesSeek?
Salesseek is created as an innovative and creative technology. There are many new and fresh ideas that want to change the way people see and foresee their sales process and forecast.

What do you dislike about SalesSeek?
All the best ideas aren't meant to work. Changes and innovation in the way something should work can't always be a fit and/or a genuine idea. You come down, sometimes to basics simply not working. Tasks being too long to show up, system running slow, search bar not smart at all and requiring you to be precise in your wordings otherwise it wouldn't simply show up any result. Delivering a very graphical product is a great achievement but it should make it's basic job and then be built on a strong and reliable base in order to add further features to the existing and satisfactory ones.

Recommendations to others considering SalesSeek:
SalesSeek is a system that can be valuable for smaller business that don't need to have a lot of additional fields otherwise this can quickly end up being very very messy and so complex to understand.

What problems is SalesSeek solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use this and so resolve our needs of CRM and internal communication about our customers.

You come down, sometimes to basics simply not working. Tasks being too long to show up, system running slow, search bar not smart at all and requiring you to be precise in your wordings otherwise it wouldn't simply show up any result. Delivering a very graphical product is a great achievement but it should make it's basic job and then be built on a strong and reliable base in order to add further features to the existing and satisfactory ones.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SalesSeek?
It is a CRM that works, you build what you want however there are some things within SS that make it hard to use.

What do you dislike about SalesSeek?
The speed of it - It can take far too long for loading, also the ability to open up certain things in seperate windows really does slow the system down for us. There is no calendar view to be able to see tasks like that - It can make things hard. When it runs slow it really runs slow and this can make it very hard for us to use. Also the task management system in there could be so much better in terms of being able to be more responsive. Having to search for certain fields which we use on a day to day basis does not always show up

What problems is SalesSeek solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our full CRM system is in SS
